Hi Howard, 

It has not been tested with iAS but it has been tested
with JBoss and Orion.  Our customers are using many
different app servers, I'm not specifically aware of
anyone on iAS but it's probable.  

The advantage we have over many of the other solutions
when it comes to J2EE is the simplicity of the
collection mechanism; they often require you to run
the entire application server through another tool, or
they use special classloaders, either of which can
cause a lot of headaches.

A servlet-based reporting mechanism is also expected
in a near-future release.  (It's already working, just
awaiting the "trimmings".)

Scott

--- Howard Lee <howardl815@...> wrote:
> Does it intergrate well with Oracle application
> server

>

> > users

> > 
> > Scott
